articles.title: Menopause: Woman with endometriosis shares medication story - BBC.com
articles.description: Emma Williams-Tully felt "vulnerable and alone" when she was put into a chemical menopause at 20.
articles.content:
By Catriona Aitken, BBC News
At 20 years old, Emma Williams-Tully had just started a relationship with her now-husband Dan when she was put into a chemical menopause

articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Brain health in aging: Intermittent fasting and healthy diets show promising results - PsyPost
articles.description: Researchers found that intermittent fasting and a healthy diet improved cognition and reduced insulin resistance in older adults with obesity. Intermittent fasting showed slightly stronger benefits.
articles.content: Researchers at Johns Hopkins Medicine and the National Institutes of Healths National Institute on Aging have uncovered promising findings regarding the effects of intermittent fasting and a standard… [+8107 chars]

articles.author: Vladimir Hedrih
articles.title: Low testosterone and high neurofilament protein predict cognitive decline in older men - PsyPost
articles.description: A recent study found that older men with low testosterone and high neurofilament protein levels are at a significantly higher risk of cognitive decline, suggesting these biomarkers can effectively predict future dementia.
articles.content: In a recent study conducted by researchers at Fudan University in Shanghai, it was discovered that lower levels of testosterone, combined with higher levels of a protein called neurofilament light ch… [+5505 chars]

articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Adolescent alcohol use linked to altered hippocampal structure in young adulthood - PsyPost
articles.description: Adolescent alcohol use is linked to larger hippocampal volumes, while tobacco and cannabis show no such effect, revealing substance-specific impacts on brain development.
articles.content: A recent study published in Experimental and Clinical Psychopharmacology has uncovered a surprising link between adolescent alcohol use and brain structure. Researchers found that larger hippocampal … [+6074 chars]

articles.author: Viktorija Ošikaitė
articles.title: Dad Beyond Livid After Boomer Poisons His Son Trying To Prove His Delusional Point - Bored Panda
articles.description: A father vented online about a boomer who purposely and knowingly switched out his son’s dish for one with wheat after refusing to believe that celiac disease is real.
articles.content: There is a particularly annoying subset of people both online and in real life who live under the impression that just because they dont have an allergy or disease, then it must basically not be real… [+4996 chars]

articles.content:

A man living with Parkinson's has said a new drug has transformed his life in a matter of days.
